file_handling

Class SessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • file_handling.SessionManager

  • public class SessionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by isaac on 19/12/17. An object used to save & load sessions. Sessions are groups of active layers. A session file should end in "\.gmcm" and store a layer name on each line.
